item.title: AI Agents – The Next Evolution of Automation
item.description: AI agents are the future of autonomous work. Learn what they are, how they function, and where businesses are already using them.

item.title: Automate Azure Cleanup — Before It Costs
item.description: Learn how to built a weekly automated Azure cleanup flow using PowerShell, Logic Apps, and Teams approvals to avoid surprise cloud bills.

item.title: End-to-End Incident Automation: Azure Alert to Self-Healing via Moogsoft & ServiceNow
item.description: How I automated azure alert remediation using Azure Alerts, Moogsoft, and ServiceNow — before it even reaches L1 support.
